expressions.name: volatility_1
expressions.llm_description: Ratio of 10-period Bollinger Bands width standard deviation to 20-period Bollinger Bands width standard deviation.
expressions.llm_reason: Compares short-term volatility to medium-term volatility in price movements.

expressions.name: composite_1
expressions.llm_description: Ratio of 7-day ATR normalized mean to 14-day ATR normalized mean
expressions.llm_reason: Combining short-term and medium-term volatility signals

expressions.name: volume_1
expressions.llm_description: 10-period and 20-period volume ratio percentage changes summed.
expressions.llm_reason: Combines short-term and medium-term volume trends for forecasting.

expressions.name: composite_4
expressions.llm_description: Volatility of 40-day volume ratio normalized by its mean
expressions.llm_reason: Assessing volatility in volume ratio over a longer period

expressions.name: composite_2
expressions.llm_description: Directional momentum strength based on 24-hour momentum mean

expressions.name: momentum_1
expressions.llm_reason: Indicates the average momentum over a longer period.

expressions.name: composite_3
expressions.llm_description: Sum of 10-day and 20-day range percentage changes
expressions.llm_reason: Aggregating short-term and medium-term range dynamics

expressions.name: composite_6
expressions.llm_description: RSI 9-day mean clipped between 20 and 80, centered at 50
expressions.llm_reason: Identifying potential overbought or oversold conditions

expressions.name: composite_5
expressions.llm_description: Difference between 20-day EMA percentage mean and 55-day EMA percentage mean
expressions.llm_reason: Contrasting short-term and long-term exponential moving averages
